nodes.text: Stop sending law enforcement to arrest sex workers and pretending you are doing something good in the name of “human trafficking”. https://t.co/87awv7tZJb
Stop using law enforcement in the thousands of situations that they are incapable of handling because it is killing people.
Stop calling police to deal with homeless people. There are alternatives. https://t.co/Jn6UpTb3I6
Stop putting law enforcement in schools. https://t.co/zI140XrY0z
Stop allowing law enforcement to interact or enforce routine traffic stops. https://t.co/7wB1Vfjqw2

Stop allowing police to get anywhere near or interact with anyone having mental health issues or anyone with a disability that any trained social worker or therapist is trained to recognize and de-escalate.
You can’t reform this you can only abolish it.  https://t.co/pmkPgnxUif
